author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-5025 include the app and global contexts in the app client jndi tree.  This causes big problems if one of these is a resource-ref or similarly references something only configured on the server

author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-5521 make bval classes available in app client so validator can be constructed

author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-5423 make lib/ persistence units in an ear global
